alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 8:52AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Live Oak and northwestern Bee Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 852 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Poth to 7 miles northwest of Nell to near Whitsett. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pawnee, Nell, Esseville and Whitsett. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 79 and 83. US Highway 181 near mile marker 572. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
